June U, 1954
Hr# Seymour N# Siegel
Director
Municipal Broadcaeting System
Municipal Building
Hew York 7, Hew York
Dear Sy s
Graydon has sent me your June 9 letter with a notation, re
Prix Italia, to name you, Harley, Wheatley and myself (ex officio) to
this committee, with the notation to add anyone else desirable* Since
this looks a little like a batch of "unanimously snowed-under* people,
do you have other ideas? Don't feel I should serve on such committees,
since it so frequently bogs us down here, but as you know, I'll always
do what I can up to 24 hours per day. Several workers, like Dawson,
Wynn, Probst, Schooley, are already also thoroughly covered up, as
we've learned by putting them (or trying to) on other committees. If
you say ok. I'll notify the above, and we can proceed.
Hope to receive the dope. With deadline data, soon.
Cordially,
HJStmr
Harry J. Skoraia
Executive Director
